description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to development and implementation of an Information Protection Organization.
name: HITRUST CSF - Information Protection Organization

values.description: Information security responsibilities are defined and allocated.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Information Protection Organization: 02.a Information Security Roles and Responsibilities

values.description: Conflicting duties and areas of responsibility are segregated to reduce opportunities for unauthorized or unintentional modification or misuse of the organization's assets.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Information Protection Organization: 02.b Segregation of Duties

values.description: Appropriate contacts with relevant authorities are maintained.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Information Protection Organization: 02.c Contact with Authorities

values.description: Appropriate contacts with special interest groups or other specialist security forums and professional associations are maintained.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Information Protection Organization: 02.d Contact with Special Interest Groups

values.description: Information security is addressed in project management, regardless of the type of project.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Information Protection Organization: 02.e Information Security in Project Management

values.description: Risks introduced by using mobile devices are managed.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Information Protection Organization: 02.f Mobile Devices

values.description: Information accessed, processed or stored at teleworking sites is protected.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Information Protection Organization: 02.g Teleworking
